sentence.Network_en: Of or relating to the synchronic typological comparison of languages.
sentence.Network_cn: 属于或有关语言的同时类型的比较的.

sentence.Network_en: Finally, I try to re - examine Deleuze's question of thinking from a synchronic and a diachronic viewpoint.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后, 我试图从共时性和历时性两个角度重新检验德勒兹的思考问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 其次是就共时 (synchronic)、异时(diachronic)、方法论三个层次来谈语言的共通性与歧异性，也就是「常」 与「变」这两个概念：我 …
然而就方法论而言, 对比语言学是一门共时语言学 （synchronic） 它只是共时地对两种或两种以上语言进行考查分析, 指出它们 , 之间 …
然而,绝大多数研究是共时的(synchronic),他们分析了现代口头和书面英语在各种情境下的使用情况。对语域这一概念和运用作出最为 …
时的」 (synchronic) 与「历时的」 (diachronic) 层面， 以致于龙树思想与月称思想混而不分。

共时性（synchronicity）：荣格认为两件或多件事于同时发生有其特殊的意义。在有翅膀的菲利门出现前，荣格发现一只少见的鱼狗死 …

means.word_mean: 1. occurring or existing at the same time or having the same period or phase;

sentences.sentence: "the synchronous action of a bird's wings in flight"

means.word_mean: 2. concerned with phenomena (especially language) at a particular period without considering historical antecedents;
3. (of taxa) occurring in the same period of geological time

auth_sentence.content: Social anthropologists generally study synchronic problems while historians study diachronic problems.
